content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/python/mypy.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use an official Python runtime as a parent image
FROM python:3.11

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install tox and other dependencies
RUN python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip && \
    python3 -m pip install tox

# Run the test suite
RUN tox -e py
